entry.title: Gotham’s personal devil.
entry.summary:
Author: Agentph03n1x

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,019Chapters: 14/?Kudos: 584

Summary: The day started off like any usual day in the hotel, ghosts huddled around the TV chatting obnoxiously loud, Ester practicing her dark magic, Ben trying to boost his ego and failing in doing so, Nathan trying to work the front desk but scaring off potential customers when his hand goes through keys instead of grabbing them. The same old normal they have become so used to after living in the hotel for so long. However, Abaddon had bigger plans in mind today, yes today on this faithful day, Abaddon was finally going to capture the Moth-man, his arch nemesis since the dawn of time.

entry.title: Lights! Cameras! And ACTION!
entry.summary:
Author: Fishwithabow

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 34,559Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 76

Summary: You are Bruce’s Wayne only BLOOD daughter. He adopted you when you were nine following your mother’s sudden death. Your mother used to be a well known actor and so of course, like mother like daughter, you too wanted to be an actor. Your father and your new siblings for some reason tend to forget about you and end up leaving you in their dust. Will that ever change? Will you become famous before they ever notice you? Or will something happen that will change your whole view of your life?

entry.title: I will find you, whenever you are
entry.summary:
Author: Florchus

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,894Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 72

Summary: One mistake. One device. Four Robins lost in time. Dick, Jason, Tim, and Damian are scattered across time. Separated from each other, and from the present, they must survive unfamiliar eras, unravel what happened, and find a way home. Meanwhile, Bruce Wayne is left behind with an empty Batcave and one impossible question: where did his sons go?

entry.title: Power
entry.summary:
Author: ope-uh-oh (shortjacketlongskirt)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 189,412Chapters: 36/?Kudos: 343

Summary: “Oh, you do like to flirt, don’t you?” Lex accused almost playfully, if not for the sharklike emptiness in his eyes. Bruce sat back as the appetizer plates were taken away and replaced with the entrée: filet mignon in a mushroom gravy, served with truffles, asparagus, and black garlic potatoes. He couldn’t help but think Clark would have appreciated this. And he desperately wished he was here with him rather than Vicki. He flashed a playful grin at Lex. “Flirting is what makes the world go round, Lex. What is that quote attributed to Oscar Wilde? ‘Everything in the world is about sex except sex, which is about power’. It applies to everything. Make people think you want them, and you’ve got the whole world in your hands.” After years of living in the closet, trying to ignore the truth, Bruce is finally cornered and is forced to come out in a very public way. This leads to a series of challenges, blending his public and private life in way he can’t escape.

entry.title: A Bat Sours Through The Night (A Parent Hugs His Children Tight)
entry.summary:
Author: KiraKiwiKi

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,546Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 23

Summary: Brucie Wayne is as much of a persona as any other, an act put on so that his identity won't be revealed. Unfortunately, Brucie Wayne is nothing like the others. Where his usual masks are stoic and creepy, quiet and deadly, Brucie Wayne is an absolute himbo. A party-animal billionaire with just enough smarts to not sink a multi-dollar company to the ground, but not enough for a brain-to-mouth or a brain-to-action one. It's a total nightmare to play Brucie Wayne, and he is very glad it is possibly his less-used mask. (Of his main ones at least.)

entry.title: The Blackstar and the Red Hood
entry.summary:
Author: TheCeruleanStar

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 43,282Chapters: 12/?Kudos: 1

Summary: What if the only way to heal the Batfamily is to break them? It was as close to normal as Gotham child tragedies could get. High school should have been normal. Where Jason Todd could mind his own business and be with someone he cared about. Where Jason Todd could feel like just once, maybe, there was stability in Gotham. It shouldn't have been on him to save her. There should have been someone who caught it, not a reckless kid from Crime Alley. There should have been someone to catch it before anything happened. They shouldn't have died. Especially not like that. And they should have stayed dead. Stay at rest. But instead, they came back. Broken. Wrong. Sharpened into something ugly that only grief and rage with nowhere to go can create. When he comes back, the Bats do what they do best: Repress. Move on. Plan contingencies so this never happens again. But you don't learn lessons if you don't have to look yourself in the eye and reckon with the truth. So what happens when another mirror that can't be angled away comes back shattered into something unrecognizable? When all she does is reflect back the consequences of their moral absolutism?

entry.title: Something about those Bats
entry.summary:
Author: RayRayTail

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,567Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 163

Summary: If Clark had known he, Conner, Kara and Jon would end up Spider-Man pointing at each other around 4am in Wayne Manor of all places, he wouldn't have tried to spend the night at all. Or, Clark Kent is helplessly in love with Bruce Wayne, Conner Kent is fiercely in love with Tim Drake, Kara Zor-El likes a good time and Jonathan Kent needs a friend. Enter the Batfamily.

entry.title: Where Even Ice Can Thaw
entry.summary:
Author: WriterDMathis

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,364Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 10

Summary: In the frozen silence of his Blackgate cell, Victor Fries expects only cold and loneliness. But on Christmas night, unexpected visitors arrive with gifts that thaw the memories of the snow-queen he lost. For one night, even the coldest heart in Gotham may remember how to feel.
